Forensic Economics Services in Raleigh

Our forensic economics practice provides economic damage analysis for litigation matters throughout Raleigh and North Carolina. We combine economic methodology with local market knowledge to deliver accurate, damage calculations.

Personal Injury & Wrongful Death

Economic loss calculations for catastrophic injuries and wrongful death cases in Raleigh:

  • Lost earnings and earning capacity
  • Fringe benefits valuation
  • Household services losses
  • Loss of parental guidance
  • Present value calculations
  • Life expectancy adjustments

Employment Litigation

Economic damages for workplace disputes and discrimination cases:

  • Wrongful termination damages
  • Front pay and back pay calculations
  • Lost benefits and pension values
  • Mitigation analysis
  • Statistical discrimination analysis
  • Wage and hour violations

Commercial Damages

Business economic losses for commercial litigation:

  • Lost profits calculations
  • Business interruption losses
  • Breach of contract damages
  • Unfair competition impacts
  • Intellectual property damages
  • Reasonable royalty rates

Raleigh Courts Served

  • Wake County professional Court
  • U.S. District Court for the Eastern District of North Carolina
  • State appellate courts
  • Alternative dispute resolution

  • expert witnesses

Our Forensic Economics Methodology

1. Case Review

Comprehensive review of case materials, medical records, employment history, and relevant economic data specific to Raleigh.

2. Economic Analysis

Detailed calculations using North Carolina wage data, industry statistics, and economic projections relevant to the Raleigh market.

3. Report Preparation

Clear, expert reports that meet court requirements.

4. Expert Testimony

courtroom testimony that clearly explains complex economic concepts to judges and juries.

Raleigh Economic Expertise

Our forensic economics practice combines national experience with knowledge of the Raleigh economy. We understand the local labor market, wage patterns, industry composition, and economic trends that impact damage calculations in North Carolina litigation.

Local Wage Data

Access to Raleigh-specific wage surveys and compensation data for accurate earnings projections.

Industry Knowledge

Understanding of major Raleigh employers and industry sectors for relevant economic analysis.

Court Experience

testimony experience in Raleigh courts with knowledge of local procedures and preferences.
